data.comment: The big names in today's match at Nabizao have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 21, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Nabizao.
Bragantino's Raul gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Goias.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Artur for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 27, Attention is being given to Bragantinoâ€™s Bruno Tubarao and play has been suspended briefly.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Claudinho (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a first change, with Tomas Cuello replacing the possibly injured Bruno Tubarao.
In the minute 30, Free kick Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Goias.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 32, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Goias's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
In the minute 35, In Braganca Paulista Goias attack through Keko. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goias a goal kick.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 38, Rafael Moura for Goias has been booked by Ramon Abatti Abel and receives a first yellow card.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Goias's Rafael Moura has run offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fabio Sanches.
Thiago Larghi (Goias) has taken off Fabio Sanches who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Heron is the replacement.
In the minute 45, Bragantino will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goias.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Braganca Paulista.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
The first-half is over at Nabizao.
In the minute 45, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ytalo.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Bragantino's Artur breaks free at Nabizao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Goias throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Free kick for Goias in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 52, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Goias throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Bragantino pushes forward through Claudinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 54, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Goias.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias.
Tomas Cuello gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bragantino.
In the minute 59, Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goias a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Nabizao.
In the minute 61, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Goias have a goal kick.
The away team replace Rafael Moura with Fernandao.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Shaylon with Douglas Baggio. This is the third substitution made today by Thiago Larghi.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 65, Goias have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 66, Cleiton for Bragantino is back on the field again.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Braganca Paulista to check on Cleiton, who is grimacing with pain.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Lucas Evangelista is on a sub for Aderlan for Bragantino.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Thonny Anderson is replacing Ytalo for the home team.
In the minute 70, Ramon Abatti Abel waits before resuming play because Cleiton for Bragantino is still down.
Throw-in Goias.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Goias to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Bragantino.
Free kick in a good position for Goias!
In the minute 73, Lucas Evangelista is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goias are pushing forward but Caju's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 75, Bragantino's Cleiton is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 76, Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goias close to the penalty box.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a throw-in for Goias, close to Bragantino's area.
In the minute 79, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 83, Goal! Bragantino extend their lead to 2-0 through Claudinho.
Thiago Larghi is making the team's fifth substitution at Nabizao with Sandrinho replacing Vinicius Lopes.
Juan Pintado is replacing Edilson for Goias at Nabizao.
In the minute 85, Lucas Evangelista is back on the pitch.
The home team replace Artur with Morato.
Bragantino make their fourth substitution with Luis Phelipe replacing Tomas Cuello.
In the minute 87, Goias are caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 89, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Goias's Sandrinho has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino have been given a penalty at Nabizao...
Bragantino's Thonny Anderson is on target but unsuccessful.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Bragantino a penalty but Thonny Anderson misses from 12 yards.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Juan Pintado is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
